const setmodalisopentotrue = () => { setmodalisopen(true) } const setmodalisopentofalse = () => { setmodalisopen(false) } var randWord = words[Math.floor(Math.random() * words.length)]; console.log(randWord) // var count = randWord.length const abc = props.user return ( <>

Kribble.io

Draw : {randWord}

Number of Letters : {randWord.length}

{abc}
setGuess(e.target.value)} placeholder="Guess here..." />
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { user: state.bats } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { addguess: (guess) => dispatch({ type: "GUESS", payload: guess }) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Play)
